akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1847. Repealed. Pub. L. 97–212, § 6(a), June 30, 1982, 96 Stat. 147
Section, Pub. L. 95–372, title IV, § 407, Sept. 18, 1978, 92 Stat. 690, related to survey of obstructions on Outer Continental Shelf and development of charts for commercial fishermen.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective June 30, 1982, and applicable with respect to claims for damages filed on or after such date, with the Secretary of Commerce under section 1845(a) of this title, see section 9(a) of Pub. L. 97–212, set out as an Effective Date of 1982 Amendment note under section 1841.
